record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, MARCH 26, 2007, AT 2:30 P.M.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 4:25 p.m., adjourned until Monday, March 26, 2007, at 2:30 p.m.
